resources.string: This is a test assignment done for www.srini-web-developer.in. App uses firebase database for backend. Initially database is empty. Click on \'+\' icon on right bottom to add object. Google Authentication is activated, so data will change across different email id used.

Database is currently empty. Click on \'+\' button on bottom right to add object.\n After adding an object, it will appear on grid. Clicking it, will take you on new page in \'VIEW\' mode. To \'EDIT\' or \'DELETE\', please \'LONG PRESS\' on the required item. \nClick \'Ok\' to begin.
